title: Misturador Monocomando St. Louise
description:
* Acabamento: **CROMADO**
* Indicação de quente e frio para melhor ajuste da temperatura
* Diâmetro da furação para instalação: 3,5 cm.
en_description:
* Finish: **CHROME**
* Pull-down with 68" braided hose
* Hot and cold logo on handle to better adjust temperature

**Why should you buy BRACCI?**

* Premier finishing product - 5 years warranty worldwide
* Italian Design
* Products choice and installation support by our specialist team
